quizPop.step1: On the start screen, select the quiz category and start the game.
quizPop.step2: Choose one of the available answers in each question.
quizPop.step3: Go through each question, answering them. Your responses will be recorded.
quizPop.step4: At the end of the quiz, you will be taken to a review screen where you can see your answers and overall score.
quizPop.step5: You can also create your own quiz questions.
